item.title: Joo Chiat Kim Choo introduces halal rice dumplings at 7-Eleven Singapore
item.description: Source: Joo Chiat Kim Choo/7-Eleven. - Halal rice dumplings from Kim Choo Kid are now sold at all 7-Eleven stores in Singapore. - Customers can choose from two flavors: Nonya Chicken and Salted Chicken. For convenience, the leaves have been removed. Singapore’s 7-Eleven stores now offer a halal version of the famous Joo Chiat Kim Choo rice dumplings. Part of the Neo Group, this top rice dumpling maker in Singapore is known for its Nonya dumplings, made with a recipe handed down through generations.
